metadata.title: CVE-2022-45919 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel through 6.0.10. Indrivers/media/dvb-core/dvb_ca_en50221.c, a use-after-free can occur isthere is a disconnect after an open, because of the lack of a wait_event.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
